text: Cancellaria lyrata, the lyrate nutmeg, is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Cancellariidae, the nutmeg snails. ==Distribution== This species can be found in Cape Verde.GBIF ==Bibliography== * Rolán E., 2005. Malacological Fauna From The Cape Verde Archipelago. Part 1, Polyplacophora and Gastropoda. ==References== Category:Cancellariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1850 Category:Gastropods of Cape Verde
title: Cancellaria lyrata
